RESUMEN.CONTENIDO:
I am a self-taught fast-paced learner with experience crafting production software. On my free time I enjoy playing videogames, learning about history, cultures and languages, embrace nature and explore and learn new tecnologies reading documentation and following quickstarts.

I have working knowledge on development, operations and automatization; unix systems and the command line interface usage; multiple programming languages and frameworks; software world trends; and more.

I have a good english level and I am able to easily read and understand technical documentation. I have experience using project management systems like Redmine, git and slack. Between my favorite tools I count Docker, Xamarin, Go, Swift, Angular, HTML5+CSS3, Atom, GitLab, Redmine, slack and CoreOS.
